name: TC02_Verify_GetBook_API_Functionality_ByID

steps.name: When We execute the Get Book Resource for Library API providing ID as query parameter
Then Verify JSON Schema of the Response returned
Then Verify Book Name is same as provided
Then Verify ISBN is same as provided
Then Verify Aisle is same as provided
Then Verify Author Name is same as provided

fullName: Verify that User is able to get book details: TC02_Verify_GetBook_API_Functionality_ByID
